snippet.title: Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Sorcery Story: Curse of the Great Curry God has been rated Teen (T) by the Electronic Software Ratings Board.  For more information, please visit: http://www.aksysgames.com/sorcery-saga/

Join Bo and Ben as they "cook" you up a sneak peak of the new game Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God. 

Aksys Games is pleased to announce Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God, a wacky, fun-filled adventure surely to satisfy your every craving for curry and non-sequitur humor! Exclusively on the PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system.

Purchase it on Amazon here. http://ow.ly/rpmDO
Purchase it on GameStop here. http://www.gamestop.com/ps-vita/games/sorcery-saga-curse-of-the-great-curry-god/112628

For more on story, characters, and gameplay of Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God, Visit http://www.aksysgames.com/sorcery-saga/

About "Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God"-
Play as the eternally bubbly Pupuru, a curry-ageous young girl on a mission to save her friend's curry restaurant and meet the Great Curry God!  With the help of her new found friends Kuu and Puni, journey across the land to find magical ingredients, enter pe-roux-lous dungeons and go where no curry-loving worshipper has gone before!
